column8: 1. Are you happy with the frequency with which you cook food at home

column17: 5. Would you consider paying £30 a year for this nutritional app?
column19: 5a2. Would you prefer spending £1 a month or have to put up with ads?
column21: 6. We are taking pre-orders for our pre-launch in 2024 at £15 for a full year. If you are interested please submit payment on the next page.
